description:
Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Iceberg`s strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Franky contro gli uomini della Galley Company
